Name: ORDER BY
Functionality: Whenever we want to sort the records based on the columns stored in the tables of the SQL database, then we consider using the ORDER BY clause in SQL.

Name: SQL group by
Functionality: The Group By statement is used for organizing similar data into groups. The data is further organized with the help of equivalent function. It means, if different rows in a precise column have the same values, it will arrange those rows in a group.
